DOC.brief_summary: To determine use impedance cardiography identify appropriate medication use treat morbidly obese patient decrease risk preeclampsia .
DOC.brief_title: Use Impedance Cardiography Decrease Risk Pre-eclampsia Obese Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Research Protocol Use Impedance Cardiography decrease risk preeclampsia obese patient Background : Obesity epidemic United States lead increase number pregnant patient obesity . Obesity , especially morbid obesity ( BMI > /= 40 ) , increase risk develop preeclampsia compare non-obese population . Impedance Cardiography never use evaluate patient population see abnormal cardiac output and/or abnormal peripheral resistance . If identify , low dose medical treatment do normalize pattern early see treatment modality decrease development preeclampsia pregnancy complication . Specific Aims : The primary aim study determine use Impedance Cardiography help identify appropriate medicine use treat morbidly obese patient abnormal test result , see normalize impedance cardiography test parameter result decrease incidence preeclampsia general pregnancy complication . Enrollment : All pregnant patient , 18-51 year old , less 20 week pregnant , BMI > /= 40 undergo impedance cardiography result abnormal , provide informed consent participate . If consent give , blood pressure < 140/90 , eligible enrollment . Randomization : All patient meet criterion undergo impedance cardiography . Those abnormal result randomize whether treat . Randomization require blindly pull paper label `` yes '' `` '' container . Those select `` yes '' randomize treatment arm prescribe antihypertensive medication commonly use obstetrics hypertension ( labetalol , nifedipine , atenolol ) Those select `` '' receive medication . Study Procedure : All pregnant patient meet study criterion abnormal Impedance Cardiography test ask participate , consent randomized treatment non treatment arm . The treatment group receive antihypertensive medication list undergo monthly cardiography test begin treatment medication adjustment normal test result obtain . The non treatment group undergo repeat cardiography test 8 week first test compare result . All enrol patient follow regular prenatal care prospective condition follow closely development high low blood pressure preeclampsia . Adverse event : Adverse event relate study minimal test non invasive complication Impedance Cardiology non existent . In addition , drug use treat hypertension use obstetrics 30 year good result minimal problem .
DOC.criteria: Pregnant patient 1851 year old , Less 20 week gestation Morbid Obesity ( BMI > /= 40 ) Not antihypertensive medication Patients allergy antihypertensive medication contraindication usage certain cardiac neurologic disorder pregnancy Patients blood pressure 140/90 great
